description.text: A mock interview is a simulation that allows you to work on verbal/nonverbal communication skills and become familiar with interview settings, here is how :
list: choose an interviewer by asking the server members.
choose/share a job offer as example with the interviewer and start the interview.
share your resume with the interviewer (use screen sharing, shared link ... etc).
take your time answering questions.
the interviewer will review the mock interview with you at the end.
